process.description: Data verification process with Vocabularies and Calcs
process.name: TCP4-2170 Data verification process with Vocabularies and Calcs
process.bpmn:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<bpmn:definitions xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:bpmn="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/MODEL" xmlns:bpmndi="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/DI" xmlns:dc="http://www.omg.org/spec/DD/20100524/DC" xmlns:di="http://www.omg.org/spec/DD/20100524/DI" xmlns:pm="http://processmaker.com/BPMN/2.0/Schema.xsd" xmlns:tns="http://sourceforge.net/bpmn/definitions/_1530553328908" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" targetNamespace="http://bpmn.io/schema/bpmn" exporter="ProcessMaker Modeler" exporterVersion="1.0" xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/MODEL http://bpmn.sourceforge.net/schemas/BPMN20.xsd">
  <bpmn:process id="ProcessId" name="ProcessName" isExecutable="true">
    <bpmn:startEvent id="node_5" name="Start Event" pm:allowInterstitial="false" pm:config="{"web_entry":null}">
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_8</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:startEvent>
    <bpmn:task id="node_6" name="Start Form" pm:screenRef="811" pm:allowInterstitial="false" pm:assignment="requester" pm:assignmentLock="false" pm:allowReassignment="false" pm:config="{"reactions":false,"voting":false,"edit_comments":false,"remove_comments":false,"web_entry":null,"email_notifications":{"notifications":[]}}" pm:validations="5">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_8</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:incoming>node_10</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_2</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:task>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_8" name="" sourceRef="node_5" targetRef="node_6"/>
    <bpmn:task id="node_16" name="Complete the form" pm:screenRef="812" pm:allowInterstitial="false" pm:assignment="requester" pm:assignmentLock="false" pm:allowReassignment="false" pm:config="{"reactions":false,"voting":false,"edit_comments":false,"remove_comments":false,"web_entry":null,"email_notifications":{"notifications":[]}}">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_7</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_13</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:task>
    <bpmn:exclusiveGateway id="node_3" name="Exclusive Gateway">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_2</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_7</bpmn:outgoing>
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_10</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:exclusiveGateway>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_2" name="" sourceRef="node_6" targetRef="node_3"/>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_7" name="Data Complete" sourceRef="node_3" targetRef="node_16">
      <bpmn:conditionExpression xsi:type="bpmn:tFormalExpression">photo != null</bpmn:conditionExpression>
    </bpmn:sequenceFlow>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_10" name="Data not complete" sourceRef="node_3" targetRef="node_6">
      <bpmn:conditionExpression xsi:type="bpmn:tFormalExpression">photo == null</bpmn:conditionExpression>
    </bpmn:sequenceFlow>
    <bpmn:endEvent id="node_11" name="End Event">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_13</bpmn:incoming>
    </bpmn:endEvent>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_13" name="" sourceRef="node_16" targetRef="node_11"/>
  </bpmn:process>
  <bpmndi:BPMNDiagram id="BPMNDiagramId">
    <bpmndi:BPMNPlane id="BPMNPlaneId" bpmnElement="ProcessId">
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_5_di" bpmnElement="node_5">
        <dc:Bounds x="320" y="50" width="36" height="36"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_6_di" bpmnElement="node_6">
        <dc:Bounds x="280" y="140" width="116" height="76"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="node_8_di" bpmnElement="node_8">
        <di:waypoint x="338" y="68"/>
        <di:waypoint x="338" y="178"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_16_di" bpmnElement="node_16">
        <dc:Bounds x="180" y="340" width="116" height="76"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_3_di" bpmnElement="node_3">
        <dc:Bounds x="320" y="260" width="36" height="36"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="node_2_di" bpmnElement="node_2">
        <di:waypoint x="338" y="178"/>
        <di:waypoint x="338" y="278"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="node_7_di" bpmnElement="node_7">
        <di:waypoint x="338" y="278"/>
        <di:waypoint x="238" y="378"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="node_10_di" bpmnElement="node_10">
        <di:waypoint x="356.35" y="277.98"/>
        <di:waypoint x="520" y="277.98"/>
        <di:waypoint x="396.31" y="178"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_11_di" bpmnElement="node_11">
        <dc:Bounds x="340" y="360" width="36" height="36"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="node_13_di" bpmnElement="node_13">
        <di:waypoint x="238" y="378"/>
        <di:waypoint x="358" y="378"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
    </bpmndi:BPMNPlane>
  </bpmndi:BPMNDiagram>
</bpmn:definitions>
